issues.title: Missing Committee Composition and Appointment Procedures
issues.description: The policy lacks specific procedures for how committee members are appointed, terms of service, and composition requirements. While the policy states the Board "may establish" committees and "shall determine duties," it provides no guidance on the appointment process, qualifications, or structural requirements for committee membership.

legal_citations.text: Defines legislative body composition and requires clear establishment of committee structure and membership

issues.required_language: Procedures for appointing committee members, including: selection criteria, terms of service, number of members, and process for filling vacancies. For committees including non-Board members, establish application and selection procedures.

issues.title: Incomplete Brown Act Compliance Procedures
issues.description: While the policy references Brown Act requirements, it lacks specific procedural details for ensuring compliance, such as agenda posting procedures, meeting notice requirements, and public comment protocols. The policy mentions these requirements but doesn't establish implementation procedures.

legal_citations.text: Requires agenda to be posted at least 72 hours before regular meetings and specifies posting location and content requirements

issues.required_language: Detailed procedures for: agenda preparation and posting timelines, designated posting locations, meeting notice distribution, public comment procedures, and record-keeping requirements for committee meetings subject to Brown Act.

issues.title: Committee Reporting and Documentation Requirements
issues.description: The policy does not specify how committees should report their activities, recommendations, or findings back to the full Board, nor does it establish documentation and record-keeping requirements for committee work.

legal_citations.text: Requires public agencies to maintain records of meetings and actions taken

issues.required_language: Requirements for committee reporting to the Board, including format and timing of reports, documentation of committee recommendations, and maintenance of committee records and meeting minutes.

issues.title: Committee Dissolution Procedures
issues.description: While the policy states that committees "shall be dissolved" when duties are completed, it lacks specific procedures for how dissolution occurs, notification requirements, and final reporting obligations.

legal_citations.text: Requires clear definition of legislative body status and termination procedures

issues.required_language: Procedures for committee dissolution, including: Board action required, notification to committee members and public, final report requirements, and transfer of committee records.
